    • Method Detail

      • makeTurn

        public void makeTurn(Board board)
        So this is how our AI moves: It consults the BoardEvaluation which returns position and destination of the piece to move.

        We also have to check, if the game is over (the AI is in checkmate), to make sure that the AI doesn't move its king into check we test as if it was an actual player (it usually shouldn't do that if there's any other way, but it sometimes does weird stuff)
